page.title: 13HOUSING
page.content: HOUSING IN GRID SQUARE 6 Our area is typically suburban.The only old property is near the Rising Sun pub on Highwood Hill and the old farmhouse on what is now Mill Hill Golf Course.There are a few very large mansions especially on Highwood Hill and in Nan Clark's Lane. Between the wars the area was developed as a result of the construction of the Barnet Bypass(A1) and the extension of the underground lines to Mill Hill and Edgware.These houses are predominantly semi-detached. Since the war the area has seen the building of the Council Estate (Bedford Road,Ramillies Road and Norbury Grove) which led directly to the buildind of Courtland School and Moat Mount School(now Mill Hill County High School).
